item.title: World Economy Latest: Inflation Guessing Game Gets Stickier
item.description: World Economy Latest: Inflation Guessing Game Gets Stickier Inflation is rising around the world, and central banks are struggling to keep it under control. The US Federal Reserve is expected to raise interest rates several times this year in an effort to cool inflation, but the European Central Bank is facing a more difficult challenge because of the war in Ukraine.
